ingredients.item: 400g pack Duchy Originals From Waitrose Organic Welsh Lamb Mince
½ tsp Cooks' Ingredients Organic Ground Cinnamon
50g essential Waitrose Pitted Green Olives, halved

instructions.step: Fry the onion and lamb in a large saucepan for 5 minutes to brown. Stir in the cinnamon, tomatoes, apricots, olives, lemon and 100ml water and simmer for 10 minutes, covered, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, place the couscous in a bowl and pour over 300ml boiling water, cover and stand for 5 minutes. Fluff up with a fork and serve with the Moroccan minced lamb.
